${ModID}:SpellStone.NAME: Spell Stone
${ModID}:SpellStone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The neighboring cards grant !M! Block when played this turn.

${ModID}:PolarBlessing.NAME: Polar Blessing
${ModID}:PolarBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The neighboring cards are Retained this turn.

${ModID}:MysticCycle.NAME: Mystic Cycle
${ModID}:MysticCycle.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard up to 2 cards and draw that many. NL Gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E][E]|@=!M! [E]}.
